name: DIESORT
description:
Made For GMTK Game Jam 2022
(Fullscreen recommended)

A dice sorting game where you need to drag the die onto the correct side of the screen within a time limit.  Prompts appear on the left and right side to tell where the die should go based on their number of eyes.

In NORMAL mode: your time limit will replenish after completing a level, but will speed up after time.

In 30 SEC mode: you have 30 seconds to complete as many levels as you can.

Good Luck!

(Playing on mobile is recommended  if you dislike mouse!)
